price: Wala sijui pengine huu ni mtihani tu kwenu na starehe mpaka muda kidogo.
arabic: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
footnotes: Na sijui pengine huko kupewa muhula na kuakhirishiwa adhabu nyinyi ndio Mwenyezi Mungu anakufanyieni mtihani tu, na kukustarehesheni kwa ladha za maisha mpaka alipo kadiria Mwenyezi Mungu kukuhisabieni kwa hikima yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-in adrī laʿallahu fit'natun lakum wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
